about_the_game:
"The Emperor is with me in this battle."
- Morvenn Vahl

Unleash the fires of vengeance upon your enemies! The Adepta Sororitas join Warpforge as a new collectable faction. Get ready to purge the unclean from the battlefield with unwavering faith and righteous fury!

Get a head start with this starter bundle, which includes:
  • The legendary warlord Morvenn Vahl!
  • 10 booster packs for Adepta Sororitas, featuring 5 cards each from this new faction, with a guaranteed rare or better card in each booster pack.
  • A premium cosmetic item, the 'Paragon Warsuit' Avatar
This DLC offers the best way to kick-start your Adepta Sororitas collection. The Imperium awaits!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, including infrequent strong language, depictions of violence and gore, and online interaction between players.
